author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Hyte Y70 Touch Infinite on Amazon - https://geni.us/yTLj or Hyte Y70 Non-Touch on Amazon - https://geni.us/IgTvHC6
We recap the last TWO weeks of news in our first episode back from a small break (after the crazy onslaught of GPU and CPU reviews). GN is hosting a meetup and PC repair event, Intel appoints a new CEO, AMD says its GPU demand is "unprecedented," and Valve is rumored to be opening up SteamOS.

Sign up for the meetup and refurbishing event at Kramden in Durham, NC! Please only sign up if you can attend: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/gamersnexus-geek-a-thon-452025-tickets-1268946686699?aff=oddtdtcreator

The event will include a refurbishing session where we troubleshoot computers, fix them, and install Linux or Windows, starting at 9 AM and lasting until 12 PM. You don't have to stay for all of it. Around 1 PM and until everyone rotates through, Kramden will also be selling a number of our old review items for cheap that we no longer need, with all sales going dir
title: HW News - SteamOS SOON™, Intel Has a New CEO (Again), Scams on Steam, AMD GPU Supply
